home.name: John wick
home.description: With the price on his head ever increasing, John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

films.title: The Giant Gila Monster
films.description: A giant lizard terrorizes a rural Texas community and a heroic teenager attempts to destroy the creature.

films.title: Manos: The Hands Of Fate
films.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

films.title: Time Chasers
films.description: An inventor comes up with a time machine, but must prevent its abuse at the hands of an evil C.E.O.

films.title: The Touch Of Satan
films.description: A young man meets a farm girl who is actually a witch.

films.title: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians
films.description: The Martians kidnap Santa Claus because there is nobody on Mars to give their children presents.

films.title: Track Of The Moon Beast
films.description: A young man is transformed into a hideous 'moon beast' due to a meteor fragment lodged in his body.

films.title: The Skydivers
films.description: A woman seeks revenge on her former lover, who owns a skydiving business.

films.title: The Killer Shrews
films.description: On an isolated island, a small group of people are terrorized by giant voracious shrews in the midst of a hurricane.

films.title: Project Moon Base
films.description: A saboteur posing as a scientist strives to destroy the world's first space station.

films.title: The Giant Spider Invasion
films.description: Giant spiders from another dimension invade Wisconsin.

films.title: Catalina Caper
films.description: A group of swingin' teens take time out from having fun in the sun to try to foil a group of crooks searching for a stolen scroll.

films.title: Secret Agent Super Dragon
films.description: A series of murders in Michigan lead an American secret agent to Amsterdam, where he uncovers a plot to imperil the world with a potent new drug.

films.title: Wild Rebels
films.description: A stock car driver goes undercover as the wheel man for a motorcycle gang.

films.title: Danger: Diabolik
films.description: International man of mystery Diabolik and his lover pull off heist after heist, all while European cops led by Inspector Ginko and envious mobsters led by Ralph Valmont are closing in on them.

films.title: Village Of The Giants
films.description: Delinquent teen-agers ingest a substance and grow thirty feet tall, then proceed to take over a small town.

movies.title: Retribution
movies.description: A bank executive receives a bomb threat while driving his children to school that his car will explode if they stop and get out. A remake of the 2015 Spanish film El Desconocido.

movies.title: Extraction II
movies.description: After barely surviving his grievous wounds from his mission in Dhaka, Bangladesh, Tyler Rake is back, and his team is ready to take on their next mission.

movies.title: Secret Invasion
movies.description: Fury and Talos try to stop the Skrulls who have infiltrated the highest spheres of the Marvel Universe.

movies.title: The Walking Dead: Dead City
movies.video: ./video/The Walking Dead- Dead City - Official Trailer.mp4
movies.description: Maggie and Negan travel into a post-apocalyptic Manhattan long ago cut off from the mainland. The city is filled with the dead and denizens who have made New York City their own world.

movies.title: Fear the Walking Dead
movies.video: ./video/Fear the Walking Dead - Season 8 Official Trailer.mp4
movies.description: A Walking Dead spinoff set in Los Angeles, California. Follows two families who must band together to survive the undead apocalypse.

movies.title: Breaking Bad
movies.description: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student in order to secure his family's future.
